item.title: Tom Mannion's Recipes
item.description: Smoked Salmon Tartare Ingredients One side of smoked salmon 1 Â½ cups finely chopped shallots 1 cup finely chopped chives EVO to moisten Salt to taste (tbsp?) Creme fraiche and chive tips to garnish Chop up salmon, add chives and shallots, moisten with EVO. Sprinkle and stir salt to taste. Place some on crostini/cracker/etc. Squirt dollop of creme fraiche. Garnish with chive tips. Goat cheese mousse and parmesan cups Ingredients
